About Me

Hi, my name is Nicolas Ortiz and I am a photographer based in Ottawa, Ontario. I have a passion for capturing the beauty of the world around us and sharing it with others.

I have been taking photos for over 4 years and have honed my skills through extensive travel and experience working with various clients.
